title: Postfix Evaluator
statement:
# Postfix Expression Evaluator

Write a program to evaluate a postfix (Reverse Polish Notation) expression.

## Problem Description

Evaluate a postfix expression containing integers and operators (+, -, *, /).
Division should be integer division (truncate toward zero).

## Input Format

A single line with space-separated tokens (integers and operators).

## Output Format

A single integer - the result of the expression.

## Constraints

- Valid postfix expression
- No division by zero
- Result fits in 64-bit integer
